verses.text_plain: I will stand upon my watch, and set me upon the tower, and will watch to see what he will say unto me, and what I shall answer when I am reproved.
verses.verse_html:
1I will stand upon my watch, and set me upon the tower, and will watch to see what he will say unto me, and what I shall answer when I am reproved. ▼
▼ tower: Heb. fenced place
 , ▼
▼ unto me: or, in me
 , ▼
▼ when…: or, when I am argued with: Heb. upon my reproof, or, arguing
